description.fr: Vaincre tous les Vampyres. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Téléporte les Vampyres sur une case adjacente au {Summoning:309!}.
description.en: Defeat all the Vampyres. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Teleports the Vampyres to cells adjacent to {Summoning:309!}.
description.es: Vencer a todos los vampyros. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Teletransporta a los vampyros a una casilla adyacente al {Summoning:309!}.
description.de: Alle Vampyre besiegen. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Teleportiert die Vampyre auf Felder, die an {Summoning:309!} angrenzen\_ .
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Vampyros. \--- {%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Teletransporta os Vampyros sobre uma célula adjacente ao {Summoning:309!}.
